aliceBio: Say bon jour to Alice! She is a mild mannered, well read lobster that can debate any intellectual topic you desire!
jeremiahBio: If you want to talk cool guy stuff, Jeremiah's the one! Toss a ball around with our ace sportsman, or enjoy a nice game of chess. Jeremiah is a lobster of many layers.
sasakiBio: Sasaki-san may seem wary of you at first, but if you get him out of his shell, he will open up and share share with you the most exciting stories of his cross-ocean travels.
banner: Today only!! Special offer on lobster fun in honor of lobster appreciation day. Buy 2 lobster rolls and get a free picture with the lobster of your choice. Click here for more details...
